title: Over the Transom: A Confounding Murder Mystery
description: " I don’t know who Mr. Matchstick is, but I’ve been writing about him in my sleep. I haven’t been the same since what happened, and my mind might be slipping. Right now, I’m just lying low in a place called Shadow, working in a bookstore filled with strange customers. But there have been murders, and detectives are crawling all over the town. I don’t want to get involved. I have secrets to keep, and I’m waiting for something. I’m not sure what. It might be me…".
author: Bill De Herder
